#include<iostream>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int n;
int arr[10][10],chk[10][10];
int path=0;
void path1(int x,int y)
{
	if(x==n-1&&y==n-1){
	path++;return;}
	chk[x][y]=1;
	if(x+1<n&&chk[x+1][y]==0&&arr[x+1][y]==0)path1(x+1,y);
	
	if(y+1<n&&chk[x][y+1]==0&&arr[x][y+1]==0)path1(x,y+1);
	
    if(x-1>=0&&chk[x-1][y]==0&&arr[x-1][y]==0)path1(x-1,y);
	
    if(y-1>=0&&chk[x][y-1]==0&&arr[x][y-1]==0)path1(x,y-1);
	
    chk[x][y]=0;
}
int main()
{
	
	cin>>n;
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
    for(int j=0;j<n;j++)
    {
	cin>>arr[i][j];
	chk[i][j]=0;
    }
	path1(0,0);
	cout<<path<<"\n";
	return 0;
}
